overview:
David is an entrepreneur, leader, and motivator who has focused on execution during his 11 years of experience in Internet technologies including search, ecommerce, and monetization at Yahoo!, Lycos, NameMedia, and Experience.com.

David began his career in Project Management, as he had a unique skill set allowing him to act as a translator and liaison between the business and technology teams.

Quickly learning the value of a data driven approach to decision making, David has applied himself in roles that gave him insight into the day-to-day operations of running a business and a multi-million dollar P&L.

David holds a bachelorâ€™s degree in Marketing from Penn State, with a minor in Information Systems.
